name: The 7 Space - Event Booking Confirmation
text: Thank you for booking with The 7 Space | Art Gallery & Wellness Center. Your reservation is confirmed for [Date] at [Time]. We look forward to welcoming you to our transformative space where art meets healing.

name: The 7 Space - Gallery Hours
text:
The 7 Space Gallery Hours:
Tuesday - Saturday: 10am - 6pm
Sunday: 12pm - 5pm
Closed Mondays
Private viewings available by appointment.

name: The 7 Space - Service Bundle Inquiry
text:
Our wellness bundles combine art therapy, meditation sessions, and gallery experiences. Popular packages include:
- Restoration Bundle: 3 sessions + gallery access
- Joy Bundle: 5 sessions + private viewing
- Transformation Bundle: 8 sessions + artist meet & greet

Which experience speaks to you?

name: The 7 Space - Artist Collaboration
text:
We're always seeking talented artists who align with our wellness mission. Our collaboration includes:
- Gallery exhibition space
- Marketing support
- Community engagement opportunities
- Revenue sharing model

Please share your portfolio for consideration.

name: The 7 Space - Wellness Program Inquiry
text:
Our wellness programs integrate art appreciation with mindfulness practices. Current offerings:
- Mindful Art Viewing Sessions
- Creative Expression Workshops
- Meditation in the Gallery
- Art Therapy Sessions

All programs are designed to promote healing and personal growth.

name: The 7 Space - Event Follow-up
text:
Thank you for joining us at The 7 Space. We hope your experience was transformative. We'd love your feedback:

1. How did the space make you feel?
2. Which artwork resonated most with you?
3. Would you recommend us to others?

Your insights help us create better experiences.

name: The 7 Space - Retail Product Description
text: This piece carries the intention of [healing/transformation/joy]. Created by [Artist Name], it represents [meaning/story]. Each purchase includes a guided meditation audio and the artist's personal reflection on the work's healing properties.

name: The 7 Space - Technical Integration Status
The 7 Space - Monitoring Dashboard
text:
The 7 Space Monitoring Access:
- Main Dashboard: http://localhost:3000/d/the7space-overview
- Booking Analytics: http://localhost:3000/d/the7space-bookings
- Gallery Metrics: http://localhost:3000/d/the7space-gallery
- Wellness Programs: http://localhost:3000/d/the7space-wellness
- Artist Engagement: http://localhost:3000/d/the7space-artists

Credentials: $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Grafana-The7Space/username') / $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Grafana-The7Space/password')

name: The 7 Space - Data Backup Procedures
text:
The 7 Space Backup Commands:
# Gallery data backup
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.backup_gallery_data --entity=the_7_space

# Booking system backup
docker exec mongodb mongodump --db=the7space_bookings --out=/backups/the7space_$(date +%Y%m%d)

# Wellness program data
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token')" \
  "http://localhost:8000/api/backup/the7space/wellness" -o the7space_wellness_backup.json

name: The 7 Space - Deployment Status
text:
The 7 Space Deployment Status:
# Check deployment health
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health/the7space

# Service status
docker-compose ps | grep the7space

# Recent deployments
docker logs higherself-server --tail 50 | grep "The 7 Space"

# Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}
# Last Deploy: $(docker inspect higherself-server | jq -r '.[0].Created')

name: The 7 Space - Logs and Troubleshooting
text:
The 7 Space Troubleshooting:
# Application logs
docker logs higherself-server --tail 100 | grep -i "7.space\|the7space"

# Booking system logs
tail -f ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/the7space_bookings.log

# Gallery management logs
tail -f ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/the7space_gallery.log

# Error analysis
grep -i "error\|exception" ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/the7space_*.log | tail -20

name: A.M. Consulting - Conflict Bravery Introduction
text: Conflict Bravery‚Ñ¢ is our trademarked approach to transforming workplace tensions into opportunities for growth. Through our proven methodology, organizations experience measurable improvements in team dynamics, communication, and productivity.

name: A.M. Consulting - Team Building Proposal
text:
Our team building programs combine conflict resolution with wellness practices. We offer:
- Half-day workshops for teams of 10-50
- Multi-day retreats for leadership development
- Ongoing coaching for sustainable change

All programs include pre/post assessments to measure transformation.

name: A.M. Consulting - Cultural Consulting Overview
text:
A.M. Consulting provides cultural transformation services for organizations ready to embrace inclusive practices. Our 50+ practitioner network brings expertise in:
- DEI strategy development
- Bias interruption training
- Inclusive leadership coaching
- Organizational culture assessment

name: A.M. Consulting - Freedom Readers Book Club
text: Join the Freedom Readers Book Club, where literature meets liberation. Monthly selections focus on social justice, personal growth, and community building. Virtual and in-person discussions available. Current book: [Title] by [Author].

name: A.M. Consulting - Retreat Planning
text:
Our transformational retreats combine conflict resolution training with wellness practices. Locations include:
- Mountain retreat centers
- Coastal wellness facilities
- Urban sanctuary spaces

All retreats include meals, accommodations, and comprehensive materials.

name: A.M. Consulting - Practitioner Network
text: Our network of 50+ practitioners spans legal, finance, healing, community organizing, mentorship, spiritual guidance, and wellness. Each brings 10+ years of experience in nonprofit, education, or corporate sectors.

name: A.M. Consulting - Professional Authority
text: Led by trusted industry authority Altagracia Montilla, creator of Conflict Bravery‚Ñ¢. Our network delivers measurable human transformation through conflict resolution, wellness programming, retreats, team building, and cultural consulting.

name: A.M. Consulting - Technical Infrastructure Status
A.M. Consulting - Data Analytics and Reporting
text:
A.M. Consulting Analytics:
# Client engagement metrics
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token')" \
  "http://localhost:8000/api/analytics/amconsulting/engagement"

# Retreat effectiveness data
open http://localhost:3000/d/amconsulting-retreats

# Practitioner network analytics
open http://localhost:3000/d/amconsulting-practitioners

# Monthly reports
python -m tools.generate_report --entity=am_consulting --period=monthly

name: A.M. Consulting - Integration Health Checks
text:
A.M. Consulting Integration Status:
# CRM integration
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health/amconsulting/crm

# Assessment platform
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health/amconsulting/assessments

# Communication tools
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health/amconsulting/communications

# Practitioner portal
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health/amconsulting/practitioners

All systems: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/amconsulting | jq -r '.status')

name: A.M. Consulting - Backup and Recovery
text:
A.M. Consulting Backup Procedures:
# Client data backup
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.backup_client_data --entity=am_consulting

# Retreat data backup
mongodump --db=amconsulting_retreats --out=/backups/amconsulting_$(date +%Y%m%d)

# Practitioner network backup
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token')" \
  "http://localhost:8000/api/backup/amconsulting/practitioners" -o amconsulting_practitioners_backup.json

# Assessment data backup
python -m tools.backup_assessments --entity=am_consulting

name: A.M. Consulting - System Logs and Diagnostics
text:
A.M. Consulting Diagnostics:
# Application logs
docker logs higherself-server --tail 100 | grep -i "am.consulting\|amconsulting"

# Client portal logs
tail -f ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/amconsulting_portal.log

# Retreat management logs
tail -f ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/amconsulting_retreats.log

# Error analysis
grep -i "error\|exception" ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/amconsulting_*.log | tail -20

# Performance metrics
open http://localhost:3000/d/amconsulting-performance

name: HigherSelf - Community Learning Hub Overview
text: HigherSelf is a nonprofit community learning hub and directory connecting individuals with practitioners, services, and educational resources. We facilitate community growth through accessible learning opportunities and meaningful connections.

name: HigherSelf - Directory Services
text:
Our directory connects community members with:
- Certified practitioners and service providers
- Educational workshops and learning opportunities
- Community events and gatherings
- Resource sharing and collaboration spaces

All listings are verified and community-focused.

name: HigherSelf - Community Learning Programs
text:
HigherSelf offers accessible learning programs including:
- Skill-sharing workshops
- Peer-to-peer learning circles
- Educational resource libraries
- Community mentorship programs

All programs are designed to strengthen community connections.

name: HigherSelf - Nonprofit Mission
text:
As a nonprofit organization, HigherSelf is committed to:
- Providing accessible community resources
- Supporting local practitioners and service providers
- Facilitating meaningful community connections
- Promoting collaborative learning and growth

name: HigherSelf - Community Member Welcome
text:
Welcome to HigherSelf! We're excited to have you join our community learning hub. Here's how to get started:
- Explore our directory of practitioners and services
- Join upcoming learning workshops
- Connect with other community members
- Share your skills and expertise

Questions? We're here to help!

name: HigherSelf - Community Event Announcement
text:
Upcoming HigherSelf Community Event:
- Event: [Name]
- Date: [Date and Time]
- Location: [Venue/Virtual]
- Description: [Brief overview]
- Registration: [Link or method]
- Cost: [Free/Sliding scale/Amount]

Join us for learning, connection, and community building!

name: HigherSelf - Technical Platform Status
HigherSelf - Community Analytics Dashboard
text:
HigherSelf Analytics Access:
# Member engagement metrics
open http://localhost:3000/d/higherself-engagement

# Learning program analytics
open http://localhost:3000/d/higherself-learning

# Community growth metrics
open http://localhost:3000/d/higherself-growth

# Event participation data
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token')" \
  "http://localhost:8000/api/analytics/higherself/events"

name: HigherSelf - Platform Integrations
text:
HigherSelf Integration Status:
# Directory integration
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health/higherself/directory

# Learning platform

# Event management

# Member portal
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health/higherself/portal

Overall status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/higherself | jq -r '.status')

name: HigherSelf - Community Data Backup
text:
HigherSelf Backup Procedures:
# Community directory backup
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.backup_directory --entity=higherself

# Learning content backup
mongodump --db=higherself_learning --out=/backups/higherself_$(date +%Y%m%d)

# Member data backup
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token')" \
  "http://localhost:8000/api/backup/higherself/members" -o higherself_members_backup.json

# Event data backup
python -m tools.backup_events --entity=higherself

name: HigherSelf - Platform Logs and Monitoring
text:
HigherSelf Platform Diagnostics:
# Application logs
docker logs higherself-server --tail 100 | grep -i "higherself\|community"

# Directory logs
tail -f ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/higherself_directory.log

# Learning platform logs
tail -f ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/higherself_learning.log

# Member activity logs
tail -f ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/higherself_members.log

# Performance monitoring
open http://localhost:3000/d/higherself-performance

name: HigherSelf Network - Server Status
text:
HigherSelf Network Server Status:
- Active Integrations: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/integrations/count | jq -r '.active')
- Database Connections: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB
- API Endpoints: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | jq -r '.endpoints_active') active
- Agent Personalities: 7 operational (Nyra, Solari, Ruvo, Liora, Sage, Elan, Zevi)
- Monitoring: Prometheus/Grafana active
- Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}

name: HigherSelf Network - API Integration Template
HigherSelf Network - Docker Deployment
text:
# Start HigherSelf Network Server
docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d && \
docker logs higherself-server --tail 50

# Environment-specific deployment
./scripts/deploy.sh --env ${ENVIRONMENT:-dev} --build

# Health check
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health

name: HigherSelf Network - Database Migration
text:
# Run database migrations
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.migrate_databases --all

# Notion database setup
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.notion_db_setup

# Supabase sync (if enabled)
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.supabase_sync

# Verify migrations
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health/database

name: HigherSelf Network - Agent Personality Status
text:
Available Agent Personalities:
1. Nyra - Lead Capture Specialist (intuitive & responsive)
2. Solari - Booking & Order Manager (clear & luminous)
3. Ruvo - Task Orchestrator (grounded & task-driven)
4. Liora - Marketing Strategist (elegant & strategic)
5. Sage - Community Curator (warm & connected)
6. Elan - Content Choreographer (creative & adaptive)
7. Zevi - Audience Analyst (analytical & sharp)

Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/agents/status | jq -r '.active_count')/7 active

name: HigherSelf Network - Agent Management
text:
# Check all agent status
curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/agents/status | jq

# Restart specific agent
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/agents/restart" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token')" \
-d '{"agent_name": "Nyra"}'

# View agent logs
docker logs higherself-server --tail 100 | grep -i "agent\|nyra\|solari\|ruvo\|liora\|sage\|elan\|zevi"

name: HigherSelf Network - Monitoring Dashboard
text:
# Open main monitoring dashboard
open http://localhost:3000/d/higherself-overview

# Agent performance dashboard
open http://localhost:3000/d/agent-performance

# System metrics dashboard
open http://localhost:3000/d/system-metrics

# Integration health dashboard
open http://localhost:3000/d/integration-health

Credentials: $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Grafana/username') / $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Grafana/password')

name: HigherSelf Network - Notion Database Sync
text:
# Full Notion sync
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.notion_sync --databases all --mode full

# Incremental sync
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.notion_sync --databases all --mode incremental

# Sync specific database
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.notion_sync --database contacts_profiles

echo "Notion sync completed: $(date)"

name: HigherSelf Network - Vector Database Query
text:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/vector/search" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token')" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
  "query": "",
  "limit": 10,
  "threshold": 0.8,
  "entity": "all"
}'

name: HigherSelf Network - Integration Priority Status
text:
Integration Priority Order:
1. The Connection Practice (Priority 1) - Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/tcp | jq -r '.status')
2. The 7 Space (Priority 1) - Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/the7space | jq -r '.status')
3. HigherSelf (Priority 1) - Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/higherself | jq -r '.status')
4. A.M. Consulting (Priority 1) - Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/amconsulting | jq -r '.status')
5. Other businesses (Priority 3) - Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/others | jq -r '.status')

name: HigherSelf Network - Environment Management
text:
# Switch environment
./scripts/manage-environments.sh switch ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}

# Validate environment
./scripts/manage-environments.sh validate ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}

# Environment status
echo "Current Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}"
echo "Debug Mode: ${DEBUG:-false}"
echo "Log Level: ${LOG_LEVEL:-INFO}"
echo "Multi-Entity Mode: ${MULTI_ENTITY_MODE:-true}"

name: HigherSelf Network - Security and Credentials
text:
# Rotate API keys
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.rotate_api_keys

# Check security status
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health/security

# Audit access logs
tail -f ./logs/${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}/security_audit.log

# Update secrets
op inject -i .env.template -o .env.${ENVIRONMENT:-dev}

name: 1Password - Retrieve API Key
text:
# Retrieve API key from 1Password
op read "op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token"

# Set as environment variable
export HSN_API_KEY=$(op read "op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token")

# Use in curl command
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/HSN-API/token')" \
  http://localhost:8000/api/status

name: 1Password - Database Credentials
1Password - SSH Key Management
text:
# Load SSH key from 1Password
op read "op://HigherSelf/SSH-Keys/higherself-server" > ~/.ssh/higherself_server_key
chmod 600 ~/.ssh/higherself_server_key

# Add to SSH agent
ssh-add ~/.ssh/higherself_server_key

# Connect to server
ssh -i ~/.ssh/higherself_server_key $(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/username")@$(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/hostname")

name: 1Password - Environment Injection
text:
# Inject secrets into environment file
op inject -i .env.template -o .env.${ENVIRONMENT:-development}

# Inject into Docker Compose
op inject -i docker-compose.template.yml -o docker-compose.yml

# Verify injection
echo "Environment file created with $(grep -c '=' .env.${ENVIRONMENT:-development}) variables"

name: 1Password - Service Account Token
text:
# Set service account token for automation
export OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN=$(op read "op://HigherSelf/Service-Accounts/automation-token")

# Verify service account access
op whoami

# Use in CI/CD pipeline
echo "OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN=$(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Service-Accounts/ci-cd-token')" >> $GITHUB_ENV

name: 1Password - Webhook Secrets
1Password - Monitoring Credentials
1Password - Emergency Access
text:
# Emergency access procedures
echo "üö® EMERGENCY ACCESS PROTOCOL üö®"
echo "1. Verify identity with emergency contact"
echo "2. Access emergency vault: $(op read 'op://Emergency/Access-Instructions/procedure')"
echo "3. Retrieve emergency credentials"
echo "4. Document emergency access in audit log"

# Emergency server access
op read "op://Emergency/Server-Access/emergency-key" > ~/.ssh/emergency_key
chmod 600 ~/.ssh/emergency_key

name: Termius - HigherSelf Server Connection
text:
# HigherSelf Server SSH Profile
Host: $(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/hostname")
Port: 22
Username: $(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/username")
Key: ~/.ssh/higherself_server_key
Tags: higherself, production, server
Startup Commands:
  - cd ~/higherself-network-server
  - source venv/bin/activate
  - ./scripts/server-status.sh

name: Termius - Voice Control Start Server
text:
# Voice Command: "Start HigherSelf Server"
echo "üé§ Voice Command: Starting HigherSelf Network Server..."
echo "üìç Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}"
echo "‚è∞ $(date)"
echo ""

# Start server with monitoring
docker-compose up -d
sleep 10
curl -f http://localhost:8000/health && echo "‚úÖ Server started successfully!" || echo "‚ùå Server startup failed!"

name: Termius - Voice Control Stop Server
text:
# Voice Command: "Stop HigherSelf Server"
echo "üé§ Voice Command: Stopping HigherSelf Network Server..."
echo "üìç Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-development}"
echo "‚è∞ $(date)"
echo ""

# Graceful shutdown
docker-compose down
echo "‚úÖ Server stopped successfully!"

name: Termius - Voice Control Server Status
text:
# Voice Command: "Check Server Status"
echo "üé§ Voice Command: Checking HigherSelf Network Server Status..."
echo "‚è∞ $(date)"
echo ""

# Comprehensive status check
echo "üê≥ Docker Status:"
docker-compose ps
echo ""
echo "üè• Health Check:"
curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | jq
echo ""
echo "üìä Agent Status:"
curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/agents/status | jq -r '.summary'

name: Termius - Voice Control Deploy
text:
# Voice Command: "Deploy Server"
echo "üé§ Voice Command: Deploying HigherSelf Network Server..."
echo "üìç Environment: ${ENVIRONMENT:-production}"
echo "‚è∞ $(date)"
echo ""

# Automated deployment
./scripts/deploy.sh --env ${ENVIRONMENT:-production} --build
echo "üöÄ Deployment completed!"

name: Termius - Voice Control View Logs
text:
# Voice Command: "Show Server Logs"
echo "üé§ Voice Command: Displaying HigherSelf Network Server Logs..."
echo "‚è∞ $(date)"
echo ""

# Real-time log viewing
echo "üìã Recent Application Logs:"
docker logs higherself-server --tail 50
echo ""
echo "üìã Following live logs (Ctrl+C to stop):"
docker logs higherself-server --follow

name: Termius - SSH Tunnel Management
text:
# Create SSH tunnel for secure access
ssh -L 8000:localhost:8000 -L 3000:localhost:3000 -L 9090:localhost:9090 \
  -i ~/.ssh/higherself_server_key \
  $(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/username")@$(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/hostname")

# Tunnel Status:
# - API Server: http://localhost:8000
# - Grafana: http://localhost:3000
# - Prometheus: http://localhost:9090

name: Termius - File Transfer Operations
text:
# Upload configuration files
scp -i ~/.ssh/higherself_server_key .env.production \
  $(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/username")@$(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/hostname"):~/higherself-network-server/

# Download logs
scp -r -i ~/.ssh/higherself_server_key \
  $(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/username")@$(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/hostname"):~/higherself-network-server/logs/ \
  ./downloaded-logs/

# Sync backups
rsync -avz -e "ssh -i ~/.ssh/higherself_server_key" \
  $(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/username")@$(op read "op://HigherSelf/Server-Access/hostname"):~/higherself-network-server/backups/ \
  ./local-backups/

name: Termius - Session Management
text:
# Create named tmux session for server management
tmux new-session -d -s higherself-mgmt
tmux send-keys -t higherself-mgmt 'cd ~/higherself-network-server' Enter
tmux send-keys -t higherself-mgmt 'source venv/bin/activate' Enter

# Split window for monitoring
tmux split-window -h -t higherself-mgmt
tmux send-keys -t higherself-mgmt:0.1 'docker logs higherself-server --follow' Enter

# Attach to session
tmux attach-session -t higherself-mgmt

name: Termius - Monitoring Integration
text:
# Start monitoring dashboard in Termius
echo "üñ•Ô∏è  Opening HigherSelf Network Monitoring Dashboard"
echo "‚è∞ $(date)"
echo ""

# Open monitoring URLs
open http://localhost:3000/d/higherself-overview
open http://localhost:9090/targets

# Display key metrics in terminal
echo "üìä Key Metrics:"
echo "- Server Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | jq -r '.status')"
echo "- Active Agents: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/agents/status | jq -r '.active_count')"
echo "- Database Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/database | jq -r '.status')"
echo "- Memory Usage: $(docker stats higherself-server --no-stream --format 'table {{.MemUsage}}')"
echo "- CPU Usage: $(docker stats higherself-server --no-stream --format 'table {{.CPUPerc}}')"

# Start continuous monitoring
watch -n 30 'curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | jq'

name: Cross-Business - Technical Integration Status
text:
Cross-Business Integration Health:
# The 7 Space Integration
echo "üé® The 7 Space: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/the7space | jq -r '.status')"

# A.M. Consulting Integration
echo "ü§ù A.M. Consulting: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/amconsulting | jq -r '.status')"

name: Cross-Business - Data Synchronization
text:
# Cross-business data synchronization
echo "üîÑ Starting cross-business data synchronization..."
echo "‚è∞ $(date)"

# Sync customer data across businesses
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.cross_business_sync --type=customers

# Verify synchronization

echo "‚úÖ Cross-business synchronization completed!"

name: Cross-Business - Performance Monitoring
text:
# Cross-business performance dashboard
open http://localhost:3000/d/cross-business-performance

# Network-wide metrics
echo "üìä Network Performance Metrics:"
echo "- Total Active Clients: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/metrics/clients/total | jq -r '.count')"
echo "- Cross-referrals This Month: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/metrics/referrals/monthly | jq -r '.count')"
echo "- Integration Health Score: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/metrics/integration/health | jq -r '.score')"
echo "- Revenue Attribution: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/metrics/revenue/attribution | jq -r '.cross_business_percentage')%"

# Performance alerts
curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/alerts/cross-business | jq

name: Cross-Business - Security Auditing

echo "‚è∞ Generated: $(date)"
echo ""

# Access control audit

# Data sharing audit

python -m tools.security_audit --scope=cross-business --output=./reports/security_audit_$(date +%Y%m%d).json

name: Cross-Business - Backup Coordination
text:
# Coordinated backup across all businesses
echo "üíæ Cross-Business Backup Coordination"
echo "‚è∞ Started: $(date)"
echo ""

# Backup The 7 Space data
echo "üé® Backing up The 7 Space..."
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.backup_business_data --entity=the_7_space

# Backup A.M. Consulting data
echo "ü§ù Backing up A.M. Consulting..."
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.backup_business_data --entity=am_consulting

# Backup HigherSelf data
echo "üåü Backing up HigherSelf..."
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.backup_business_data --entity=higherself

# Create consolidated backup
echo "üì¶ Creating consolidated backup..."
tar -czf ./backups/cross_business_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).tar.gz ./backups/the7space_* ./backups/amconsulting_* ./backups/higherself_*

echo "‚úÖ Cross-business backup completed!"

name: Cross-Business - Incident Response
text:
# Cross-business incident response protocol
echo "üö® CROSS-BUSINESS INCIDENT RESPONSE ACTIVATED üö®"
echo "‚è∞ Incident Time: $(date)"
echo "üìã Incident ID: CB-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)"
echo ""

# Check all business systems
echo "üîç System Status Check:"
echo "- The 7 Space: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/the7space | jq -r '.status')"
echo "- A.M. Consulting: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/amconsulting | jq -r '.status')"
echo "- HigherSelf: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/higherself | jq -r '.status')"
echo "- Core Infrastructure: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | jq -r '.status')"

# Activate monitoring
echo "üìä Activating enhanced monitoring..."
open http://localhost:3000/d/incident-response-dashboard

# Log incident
echo "üìù Logging incident..."
echo "$(date): Cross-business incident response activated" >> ./logs/incidents/cross_business_incidents.log

echo "üìû Next Steps:"
echo "1. Assess impact across all businesses"
echo "2. Implement containment measures"
echo "3. Communicate with stakeholders"
echo "4. Document resolution steps"

name: Cross-Business - Capacity Planning
text:
# Cross-business capacity planning analysis
echo "üìà Cross-Business Capacity Planning Report"
echo "‚è∞ Generated: $(date)"
echo ""

# Current resource utilization

echo "- CPU Usage: $(docker stats --no-stream --format 'table {{.CPUPerc}}' | tail -n +2 | awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum/NR"%"}')"
echo "- Memory Usage: $(docker stats --no-stream --format 'table {{.MemUsage}}' | tail -n +2)"
echo "- Database Connections: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/metrics/database/connections | jq -r '.active')"
echo "- API Request Rate: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/metrics/requests/rate | jq -r '.per_minute')/min"

# Growth projections

curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/analytics/capacity/projections | jq

# Recommendations

# Generate detailed report
python -m tools.capacity_planning --scope=cross-business --output=./reports/capacity_planning_$(date +%Y%m%d).json

name: Integration - Zapier Webhook
text:
curl -X POST "https://hooks.zapier.com/hooks/catch/$(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Zapier/hook-id')/$(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Zapier/hook-key')" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
  "business": "",
  "event": "",
  "data": {},
  "timestamp": "'$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)'",
  "source": "higherself-network-server"
}'

name: Integration - Airtable Update
Integration - Notion API Call
Integration - High Level API
text:
# High Level API Configuration Status

echo "- Omni chat integration: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/highlevel/omnichat | jq -r '.status')"
echo "- Missed call text-back: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/highlevel/missed-calls | jq -r '.enabled')"

# Test High Level connection

-H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/HighLevel/api-key')" \

name: Integration - Supabase Operations
text:
# Supabase database operations
echo "üóÑÔ∏è  Supabase Integration Status:"
echo "- Database Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/supabase/database | jq -r '.status')"
echo "- Auth Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/supabase/auth | jq -r '.status')"
echo "- Storage Status: $(curl -s http://localhost:8000/health/supabase/storage | jq -r '.status')"

# Sync data to Supabase
docker exec higherself-server python -m tools.supabase_sync --mode=incremental

# Query Supabase
curl -X GET "$(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Supabase/url')/rest/v1/[table_name]" \
-H "apikey: $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Supabase/anon-key')" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer $(op read 'op://HigherSelf/Supabase/service-key')"
